concept.title: Configure
concept.shortdesc: This section describes the parameters you need to set in order to launch for the first time.

conbody.p: The first launch of is different than a restart of a previously running deployment in that it sets up the security mechanisms that will be used by the installation to ensure system integrity.

configuration is stored in a text file, /etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.conf, that contains key-value pairs specifying various configuration parameters. reads this file when it launches and when various forms of reset commands are sent it the components.
